src_original: tat ṣaṇṇāṃ [105/12]  ārūpyāvacaraṃ kukśalaṃ svebhyastribhyo rūpāvacarāt kukśalācchaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ ca / [105/13]
tgt_original: 色善生十一，　　此復從九生，

src_original: nivṛtātsapta [105/14-105/15]
tgt_original: 有覆從八生，　　此復生於六，

src_original: ārūpyāvacarānnivṛtātsvabhūmikāni trīṇi rūpāvacaraṃ kuśalaṃ nivṛtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭadvayam / [105/16]
tgt_original: 無覆從三生，　　此復能生六。 無色善生九，　　此復從六生，

src_original: tattathā / [105/17]  tadapi saptabhya evotpadyate /  kāmarūpāvacarāṇi kliṣṭāni śaikṣāśaikṣe ca hitvā / [105/18]  caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam / [105/19]  traidhātukebhyaḥ kuśalebhyaḥ śaikṣācca / [105/20]
tgt_original: 有覆生從七，　　無覆如色辯。

src_original: asmāttu pañca [105/21]  tānyeva catvāryaśaikṣaṃ ca / [105/22]  aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt // VAkK_2.70 // [105/23]  ata evānantaroktāt / [105/24]  tasmāccatvāri cittāni [105/25]  tasmātpunaraśaikṣāccittātsamanantaraṃ catvāri cittānyutpadyante / [105/25-105/26]
tgt_original: 學從四生五，　　餘從五生四，

src_original: traidhātukāni kuśalānyaśaikṣaṃ ca // [105/26]  samāptāni dvādaśa cittāni // [105/27]
tgt_original: 十二為二十，　　謂三界善心，

src_original: brahmalokasahasraṃ ca sāhasraścūḍiko mataḥ // VAkK_3.73 // [171/15-171/17]  sahasrañjaṃbūdvīpānāṃ pūrvavidehānāmaparagodānīyānāmuttarakuruṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ  candrāṇāṃ sumerūṇāṃ sahasraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvat paranirmitavaśavartināṃ  sahasraṃ brahmalokānāmayamucyate sāhasraścūḍiko lokadhātuḥ / [171/18]  tatsahasraṃ dvisāhasro lokadhātustu madhyamaḥ / [171/19]  teṣāṃ cūḍikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sahasraṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ / [171/20]
tgt_original: 四大洲日月，　　蘇迷盧欲天，

src_original: samasaṃvartasaṃbhavaḥ // VAkK_3.74 // [171/24]  samaṃ saṃvartate samaṃ vivartate /  saṃbhavo hi vivartaḥ ityuttaratra vyākhyāsyate / [171/25-171/26]  kiṃ khalu yathā bhājanānāṃ pramāṇabheda evaṃ tadvāsināmapi sattvānāṃ pramāṇabhedo'sti / [171/26]  astītyāha /  tatra tāvat [171/27]
tgt_original: 此小千千倍，　　說名一中千， 此千倍大千，　　皆同一成壞。

src_original: jāmbūdvīpāḥ pramāṇena catuḥsārdhatrihastakāḥ / [171/28]  jambūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ pramāṇārdhacaturhastakāḥ kecittu caturhastakāḥ [172/01]
tgt_original: 贍部洲人量，　　三肘半四肘，

src_original: pūrvavidehakā godānīkā uttarakauravāśca manuṣyā aṣṭaṣoḍaśadvātriṃśaddhastakā yathākramam / [172/04]  pādavṛddhyā tanuryāvatsārdhakrośo divaukasām / [172/05]  kāmināṃ [172/06]  pādaḥ krośasya caturtho bhagaḥ / [172/06-172/08]  tanmātraṃ śarīraṃ cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ dvau pādau trāyastriṃśānāṃ trayo yāmānāṃ catvārastuṣitānāṃ pañca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ adhyardhaḥ krośaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām  rupiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ [172/10]  rūpiṇāṃ devānāṃ prathame sthāne brahmakāyikānāmardhayojanamātraṃ śarīram / [172/11]
tgt_original: 東西北洲人，　　倍倍增如次。

src_original: ardhārdhavṛddhiḥ [172/13]  triṣu sthānesu brahmapurohitānāṃ yojanaṃ mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyardhaṃ parīttābhānāṃ dve yojane / [172/14-172/15]  urdhvaṃ tu parīttābhebhya āśrayaḥ /  dviguṇadviguṇā hitvā 'nabhrakebhya'striyojanam // VAkK_3.77 // [172/16]  apramāṇābhānāṃ catvāri yojanāni /  ābhāsvarāṇāmaṣṭau / [172/16-172/17]  evaṃ dviguṇavṛddhyā yāvacchubhakṛtsnānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ / [172/17-172/18]  anabhrakāṇāṃ tato yojanatrayeṇa hīnaṃ dviguṇaṃ pañcaviṃśatiyojana śatam / [172/18-172/19]

tgt_original: 乘斯壽五百，　　上五倍倍增。

tgt_original: 色無晝夜殊，　　劫數等身量，

tgt_original: 斷道有漏業，　　具足有五果，
